name: vega-hierarchy
description: Hierarchical layout transforms for Vega dataflows.

1.0.0-beta.name: vega-hierarchy
1.0.0-beta.description: Hierarchical layout transforms for Vega dataflows.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-hierarchy.js -c -m -o build/vega-hierarchy.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-collection:d3,d3-hierarchy:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-hierarchy.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-hierarchy.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-hierarchy.js build/vega-hierarchy.min.js

readme:
# vega-hierarchy

Hierarchical layout transforms for Vega dataflows.

This module provides the following Vega data transforms:

- [**Nest**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/nest/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-hierarchy/blob/master/src/Nest.js "Source")
- [**Pack**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/pack/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-hierarchy/blob/master/src/Pack.js "Source")
- [**Partition**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/partition/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-hierarchy/blob/master/src/Partition.js "Source")
- [**Stratify**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/stratify/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-hierarchy/blob/master/src/Stratify.js "Source")
- [**Tree**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/tree/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-hierarchy/blob/master/src/Tree.js "Source")
- [**Treemap**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/treemap/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-hierarchy/blob/master/src/Treemap.js "Source")
- [**TreeLinks**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/treelinks/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-hierarchy/blob/master/src/TreeLinks.js "Source")
